title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions
While pasta cooks, dice pancetta and cook in a large pan until crispy
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated parmesan, and black pepper
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water
Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper

title: Creamy Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Rich and creamy pasta dish with tender chicken in a classic alfredo sauce.
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package directions, drain and set aside.
Season chicken with salt and pepper, then cut into bite-sized pieces.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook chicken pieces until golden and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes.
Remove chicken and set aside.
In the same skillet, melt butter and sauté minced garlic for 1 minute.
Pour in heavy cream and bring to a gentle simmer.
Gradually whisk in parmesan cheese until smooth.
Return chicken to the skillet and add cooked pasta.
Toss everything together and serve immediately.

title: Vegetarian Black Bean Tacos
description: Flavorful and filling tacos packed with seasoned black beans and fresh toppings.
instructions: Drain and rinse black beans.
Dice onion and bell pepper.
Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Sauté onion and bell pepper until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add black beans, cumin, and chili powder.
Cook for 5-7 minutes, mashing some beans slightly.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or microwave.
Slice avocado and chop cilantro.
Fill tortillas with bean mixture.
Top with avocado, cheese, cilantro, and lime juice.

title: Honey Garlic Salmon
description: Tender salmon fillets glazed with a sweet and savory honey garlic sauce.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place salmon fillets on a lined baking sheet.
In a small bowl, whisk together honey, soy sauce, minced garlic, and ginger.
Heat olive oil in a small pan over medium heat.
Pour honey mixture into the pan and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
Brush half of the glaze over salmon fillets.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until salmon flakes easily.
Brush with remaining glaze and sprinkle with lemon juice.
Garnish with chopped green onions before serving.

title: Classic Beef Stir Fry
description: Quick and colorful stir fry with tender beef and crisp vegetables in a savory sauce.
instructions: Slice beef thinly against the grain.
Cut all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Mix soy sauce, oyster sauce, and cornstarch in a small bowl.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Stir-fry beef until browned, about 3-4 minutes. Remove and set aside.
Add remaining oil to the pan.
Stir-fry garlic and ginger for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Return beef to pan and add sauce mixture.
Stir everything together for 1-2 minutes until sauce thickens.

title: Banana Bread
description: Moist and flavorful banana bread perfect for breakfast or as a snack.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Mash bananas in a large bowl until smooth.
Melt butter and let cool slightly.
Mix mashed bananas, melted butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Add dry ingredients to wet ingredients and mix until just combined.
Pour batter into prepared loaf pan.
Bake for 55-60 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto wire rack.
